message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're adding to the product. I'd like to propose a price of $90.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I believe it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.
I understand your perspective, Alice. Let me propose a price of $105 to see if we can reach an agreement.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $115. I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $110 to see if we can finalize the deal.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can offer it to you for $112.50. I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.
